title: Sunny, private room in Brooklyn!
location: Room in Brooklyn, New York, United States
description: This is a small, cozy room with a very comfortable bed!   Enjoy your stay in this welcoming space.The spaceLooking for a bright cozy bedroom?    I've got just the space for you!  There is a place to read, study or sleep on the very comfortable bed.Guest accessShare the open kitchen and living spaces with me and other house guests.   There is plenty of room to spread out and relax after your day in the city.   I've been a host to international students for many years and have plenty of ideas for you to enjoy the city on a budget.Other things to noteI have a dog and enjoy a friendly, open, gay friendly and non-smoking environment.Registration DetailsOSE-STRREG-0000572

title: Quiet, quaint room in Victorian Town House
location: Room in Brooklyn, New York, United States
description: COZY VICTORIAN TOWNHOUSE IN SAFE HISTORIC LANDMARK DISTRICT CLOSE TO PUBLIC TRANSPORTATION , 30  -40 MINUTES TO TIMES SQUARE. CLOSE TO PROSPECT PARK, BROOKLYN BOTANICAL GARDENS, LIBRARIES,  MUSEUM, RESTAURANTS, SUPER MARKETS, DELIS.NO SMOKING. PUBLIC SECURITY CAMERAS.The room is located on the third floor of a walk up.Entire house has Aquasana Rhino water Filtration system.Security cameras located on  front of house covering  front  yard, front door entrance and stairways.The spaceA truly beautiful, comfortable small room with a twin size bed, lots of shelving space, a desk and chair, ceiling and desk fan. It is  located on the third floor of an authentic  walk up Victorian Town House.  It has a window facing the street with a view of the front garden which is very beautiful during the summer and early autumn.  Many guest have verbalized that the  space gives an extremely warm, cozy, feeling of being at home.  A very  popular space.Again, to reiterate- this is a small room. With a twin size bed. Only suitable for one person.Guest accessWIFI, refrigerator,  microwave, electric kettle and a two ring electric burner.  Perfect for preparing light meals.During your stayModerate to minimal - great setting for busy energetic international students, creative people who want to explore the city, for people attending seminars or who are working on special assignments etc.Other things to noteMinimum 5 nights.Conveniently located close to transportation. Supermarkets, delis and restaurants are close by. Laundromat at top of the street. Very racially, culturally and socioeconomically diverse vicinity. Safe  location.Generally very quiet but can get loud at times with city sounds.Please no food items or eating in room. Thereâ€™s a kitchen for that.This room is not air conditioned. There are fans.Registration DetailsOSE-STRREG-0000396

title: Cuencanita Rooms
location: Room in Queens, New York, United States
description: Modern private bedroom on the 2st floor. Unit B-Queen size bed with shared kitchen/living room/bathroom with other guest. Guest will need to SHARE common space such as KITCHEN, and BATHROOM with other guestOther things to now;Quest will be sharing space with the host. Please be considerate of other guest and lower your TV volume/noise after 10pm.The spaceWe share the BATHROOM and BATHROOM space with all guests.Guest accessIf at any moment the door donâ€™t open Remove the cover, then remove all 4 batteries and put them back the lock will reset and door will open. That only will happen when batteries are running low and have to be change.Other things to noteQuest will be sharing common space with other the host.Registration DetailsOSE-STRREG-0001381

title: Budget traveler's private room 2C
location: Room in North Bergen, New Jersey, United States
description: Cozy safe place cross Hudson River from NYC. This room is strictly limited for one person only to control the quality of staying. Nothing fancy, but spend fraction of money to enjoy NYC. Room has Queen bed and key lock , shared bathroom with 3 other guests if fully sold out. Shared kitchen, dining room with 5 other guests maximum (3rd floor apartment has 2 guests)2 and 1/2 blocks away from bus stop, 30 minutes $3.50 will bring you to center of NYC: Time Square. Private parking space $10/dayThe spaceTV inside the bedroom, has all you need for your vacationGuest access2nd floor your private room 2C, shared kitchen, dining room and bathroom.During your stayPer guests requestOther things to notePlease leave the towels inside your room.Quiet time is 10pm to 7am, please do not use kitchen during that time. Thank you.If you need to contact me, please through Airbnb message or text me. Do not call me please, because Iâ€™m traveling a lot.

title: Private Moonlight Room in Brownstone Near Subway
location: Room in Brooklyn, New York, United States
description: Welcome to our funky and creative rooming house in the Bedstuy/Bushwick area of Brooklyn! We host people from around the world in a classic brownstone townhouse, in the heart of Brooklyn's most vibrant neighborhoods, with only an 8 minute walk to the subway.  This is a secure private bedroom with 2 shared bathrooms, communal kitchen and living room. There is no pressure to socialize, we respect your privacy, and ask you to respect our house and fellow guests.The spaceA guesthouse experience, where travelers from around the world are hosted in a creative and cozy atmosphere. Check-in is easy with front door code entry, and the option to leave your luggage before check in or after checkout to pick up later. You will have a secure private bedroom, with access to 2 shared bathrooms, and a communal living room and kitchen, where we offer coffee and tea. There will be other guests at the house during your stay, but there is no pressure to socialize. This room has a twin size bed, and is for single guests only.Guest accessWe offer an easy self service check-in with front door code entry and the option to drop off your luggage before check-in, or leave it after checkout to pick up later. You will have a secure private bedroom on the third floor, with access to 2 shared bathrooms on the second and third floors, and a communal kitchen and living room on the second floor. In front of the house we have a garden with patio furniture you are welcome to enjoy.During your stayWe live on the ground floor, and will be more than happy to assist you with anything during your stay, by phone, Airbnb messaging, or a friendly knock on our door. Please be aware that this is a home, not a hotel, and we don't offer 24 hour front desk service, but we will help you as soon as we can. We respect the privacy of our guests and would love to meet you, but it's up to you how much you want to socialize, there is no pressure.Other things to noteThis room has a twin size bed and is for single occupants only.  Be aware that this room has a slanted ceiling. You can drop off your luggage before check-in, or leave it after checkout to pick up later if you need.We offer coffee and teaRegistration DetailsExempt

title: Cute, Cozy & Peaceful Private Room for Solo Guest
location: Room in Queens, New York, United States
description: Kick back and relax in this calm, stylish space. Welcome to your serene private room in soothing blue color, designed to provide you with a peaceful and relaxing stay.The room is furnished with a comfortable twin-size bed, desk and a chair combo to perform some essential work while traveling, a 32" smart TV, complete with soft, luxurious linens and pillows, ensuring a restful night's sleep. Overall, this calming and soothing room provides a perfect sanctuary for you to unwind and recharge.The spaceThis is a 3 bedroom apartment (in a 2-family private house) where the host lives and the private room is reserved for 1 guest at a time. The kitchen, the bathroom and other common areas are shared with the host during the guest(s)' stay.. The host will be present within the unit during a guests' stay.Guest access- Other than the private room, the rest of the apartment;  the kitchen and the bathroom are fully accessible and they are shared spaces with the host...- All utensils, kitchenware, appliances are available for guests' use including storing, preparing and cooking any type of meal at any time.- Guests are also permitted to order any deliveries, whether food, packages or similar.- The host lives in the apartment full time and is always available to answer any questions and/or help the guests with their room or the apartment in general whenever guests require assistance.During your stayThe host will be present within the unit during all guests' stay, and will always be available to answer any questions or help the guests with any room and/or apartment related requests.Other things to note- This is a non-smoking house and smoking (includes everything from cigarettes, electronic cigarettes, and cigars to cannabis, weed, vaping devices, etc) anywhere inside the apartment, including the private room is not permitted. There is a $300 fee for each violation. - No day-time visitors are permitted in the apartment without the express consent of the host. There will be a $75 fee for each violation to this rule. - No overnight visitors are permitted. In case of an unregistered/unauthorized/off-AirBnb visitors, there is a $125 fee per occasion.- A late check-out fee of $50 may be applied for check-outs beyond 11am on the final day,- Pets and children under 10 cannot be accommodated in this apartment due to the limitations of pet-related and child-related amenities,- No parties,- No loud music/noise/TV/etc after 11pm and until 9am- KITCHEN: No oil cooking (frying) allowed, unless previously discussed and agreed on conditionsRegistration DetailsOSE-STRREG-0003389

title: Bedroom in recent duplex
location: Room in Noisy-le-Sec, France
description: I welcome you with simplicity and friendliness with my two cats.Near RER E station / metro lines 11 and 5 in about twenty minutesNoisy: 10-15 min from Paris by RERBreakfast: coffee/tea/biscuit is offeredNo cooking possible (No oven or stove) Microwave heating only / kettle, shelf in fridge. Lockable room in 90 m2 Dupleix apartmentVery quiet secure residence / Terrace En suite bathroomThe spaceSuper bright 90 m2 duplex with terrace.You have a bedroom and a private bathroomGuest accessBedroom and private bathroom.Living room, toilet, shared kitchenDuring your stayI work from home, so information is easily given.Other things to noteAllergic to cats, refrain!

title: Close to Paris & Orly - Fully-equipped Cozy Room
location: Private room in rental unit in Vitry-sur-Seine, France
description: Bright room in a modern apartment in Vitry-sur-Seine (7th floor, elevator), ideal for business or tourism. Equipment: double bed (140 cm), ergonomic desk, dressing room. Shared spaces: equipped kitchen, TV lounge, modern bathroom and large balcony with panoramic views. Location: RER C nearby (FranÃ§ois Mitterrand Library in 10 min), Tram T9 and shops. A secure and comfortable pied-Ã -terre for your stay.The spaceWelcome to this pleasant and comfortable apartment, ideal for a quiet and relaxing stay. You will have a private room, carefully prepared to offer you all the comforts you need.The accommodation is bright, clean and functional, perfect for solo travelers or business stays. The atmosphere is quiet and friendly, conducive to relaxation after a day outside.The apartment is located in a quiet residence, with easy access to transport (7 min walk), shops and amenities.Your room is completely private, while the other spaces are shared.Everything is planned to make you feel at home.Guest accessYou will have a private bedroom, as well as access to common areas shared with the host, including the living room and kitchen, bathroom and balcony.Other things to noteThis accommodation is ideal for quiet and respectful guests, who are concerned about preserving the comfort and tranquility of the place and the neighborhood.Registration Details94081000289Q4

title: Nice mezzanine at  "la dhuys" station (M11)

description: Near metro atation "la dhuys " line 11, It is a sleeping place on a mezzanine under roof: although hidden from view, it is an open space, without door. Very sunny and quiet area. the floor is oak. 2 glass doors give access to a shared terrace. the mezzanine is equipped with a mattress over a futon, a bedside table and a low cabinet with shelves.the bathroom and kitchen are shared. Kitchen it's avaiable only for warming dishes.For more intimacyhttps://www.airbnb.com/h/chambre93130The spaceNice mezanine under the roof in charming house. the whashing machine and drying machine can be use for 4â‚¬. breakfast or diner can be served on request (5 â‚¬ whith coffee or thÃ©, one croissant or pain au chocolat, a glass of fruit juice) Towels and bed linen included. title:
Room near
Paris and Disney
location: Private room in rental unit in Neuilly-sur-Marne, France
description: Private room in an apartment to share with the current tenant, has its own locking system, with an office space and storage. The bathroom, toilet, kitchen and living room are in the common area. Close to all amenities (supermarket, bakery, shops, etc. 3 min walk). Public transport bus and RER A (Neuilly-Plaisance station) 8 min walk. 20 minutes from the center of Paris, 30 minutes from Disneyland Paris. The banks of the Marne nearby for walks or jogging.

title: Spacious bedroom #1 in Apartment near Paris
location: Room in Sartrouville, France
description: We offer a large garden-side room, in a spacious and bright apartment, located in Sartrouville. The neighborhood is quiet and you are close to a park and the quays of the Seine. You can enjoy the living room and we provide everything you need to cook.We are an 8-minute walk to the train station (RER 20 minutes from Paris and SNCF).The spaceLarge bedroom (18 mÂ²) with office space and storage located in an apartment (house divided into 2) of 115 mÂ² in the "Vieux Pays" suburban area, close to the banks of the Seine and a park.1st floorGuest access: living/dining room, large kitchen, bathroom and toilet (separate), garden with small terrace and barbecue1 catGuest accessGuests can take advantage of the kitchen with all the necessary appliances as well as the bathroom (shower) and living room.Finally, the terrace and garden are of course accessible for sunny days, with the possibility of barbecuing!During your stayI will be available for any questions and information.I am available all day on weekends, otherwise in the evening on weekdays (I work in Paris)Other things to noteNumerous small local shops a few minutes' walk away (bakery, takeaway pizzas, pharmacy, etc., and Auchan Market supermarket a 5-minute walk away. Restaurants are also minutes away.I remind you here that the entire place is NON-SMOKING, thank you.

title: 5E - Bright & Cozy Micro Studio
location: Entire rental unit in Sathon, Thailand
description: These renovated micro studios are cool, clean and comfortable. It is ideal for budget minded solo traveler looking for their own space. Each studio has an en-suite bathroom, A/C, ceiling fan, refrigerator, table and a kitchenette. No cooking at the moment.Self check-in starts at 14:00The spaceBaan 192 is ideally located for those who are looking to explore the city by foot, boat or BTS. Saphan Taksin BTS station is just a 10 minute walk down Bangkok's oldest road, Charoen Krung.  Also at Saphan Taksin (Taksin Bridge) you will find the Sathorn Pier. Hop the Chaopraya express boat for 15 baht per person and cruise up the river to Wat Arun, Wat Pho or the Grand Palace.Just past Saphan Taksin you will find Robinson Shopping center and in the evening, enjoy Bang Rak's Food carnival. A combination of food trailers, food court, shop house restaurants and more!Guest accessCovered rooftop has washers and hanging are for drying clothes. No dryer.Other things to noteMicro studio will either be on the 4th or 5th floor. There is no elevator.

title: The venue for Japan's national sport, sumo! /5-minute walk from Ryogoku Station/Tsukiasa RC building/Skytree Asakusa area/Full self-catering facilities

popular area of Kuramae with its cafes and restaurants, or visit the tourist spots of Asakusa and Skytree in the neighborhood, which is a fun area to walk around all day.Ideal for long-term use, this title: Based location for visiting Tokyo near Station#102
location: Entire rental unit in Sumida-ku, Japan
description: 3mins walk from Oedo Line Ryogoku sta, 8mins walk from JR station.Located in a quiet residential area, Within the convenient commercial district. The building is located within walking distance from Ryogoku Kokugikan, famous for Sumo, as well as other major sightseeing spots such as the Oedo Museum, Hokusai Museum.  A perfect base to explore Tokyo, with most of the famous sightseeing spots (Ginza,Akihabara, Asakusa, etc.) accessible within 30 minutes.Babysitting services are also available.The spaceThis unit is located on the 1st floor of the 3-story apartment building. There is one double size of bed and Futon. The host lives on the 2nd and 3rd floor and The units are completely separate from each other, having private entrance, bathroom, and kitchen. As a standard size(Japanese size) apartment in Tokyo, it may not be so spacious, but we prepared the rooms with much care so you can be comfortable throughout your stay.The host lives in the same building and will be able to promptly assist in times of emergency or with any inconvenience.We have additional units in the same building listed on Airbnb, so feel free to ask if you have a big family or plan on traveling with a large group of people.Guest accessAll facilities and equipment within the apartment are available to you.Other things to note1. Check-in is not allowed after 22:00 due to neighborhood disturbance.(Landing flights from Narita Airport until 19:00 and Handa until 20:00 )2. Luggage storage is available before check-in and afeter check-out.3. Early check-in is subject to room availability.4. Japanese law requires the host to store passport information, etc.Registration DetailsHotels and Inns Business Act | æ±äº¬éƒ½å¢¨ç”°åŒºä¿å¥æ‰€ | 31å¢¨å‰¯è¡›ç”Ÿç’°ç¬¬6å·

title:
Perfect for solo travelers
Homestay-style guest room
location: Room in Sumida-ku, Japan
description: Have a homely stay in Tokyo.I live with my 8-year-old and 5-year-old children.The mornings and evenings are hectic because the children go to school.Please note that we will use the washing machine and vacuum cleaner after 8 am.There is a restaurant nearby, and it can be noisy at night with karaoke, etc.Convenience store, 3-minute walk.Coin laundry is a 30-second walk.Tokyo Skytree is a 15-minute walk.10-minute walk to Hikifune Station on the Tobu Line.The spaceThe guest room is on the first floor, just inside the entrance.The room is equipped with an air conditioner (cooling and heating), TV, and electric kettle.The key can only be locked from the inside.One set of bath towels and face towels will be provided for one stay.There will be no towel changes during your stay.On the first floor, there is a toilet, bath, and washstand, which are shared with the host family.Shampoo and treatment are available.Hair dryer is available.Please use the coin-operated laundry in the neighborhood.Please refrain from using the kitchen.The refrigerator and microwave are next to the guest room and are shared, but please use them.* We will dispose of any forgotten food or drinks.Please turn off the lights and air conditioner when you go out.Please put the trash in the trash can in the hallway.We will dispose of it.* Please refrain from bringing large items such as suitcases.Guest accessFeel free to use the guest room, toilet, bathroom, and washroom on the first floor.Please refrain from entering the floors above the 2nd floor as it is the private space of the host family.During your stayI am basically staying here, so please feel free to ask.Other things to notePlease be considerate and understanding as the bathroom and toilet are shared.I will give you the PIN number for the key to the front door in person.Please contact us for check-in times, luggage storage, etc., and we will respond to the extent possible.Please let me know if you have any problems or anything around you.Registration DetailsM130050725

title: 1 min walk from JR Ogiku Station, 1 stop to Ueno, 2 stops to Tokyo, convenient transportation, suitable for both business and leisure. Single Japanese-style room (Japanese-style mattress) #601
location: Private room in rental unit in Kita, Japan
description: Thank you for coming to this apartment.This accommodation is a 6-story independent building with an elevator. The elevator can go up to the 5th floor. Room 601 is on the 6th floor, you need to take the stairs from the 5th floor.The train station (Ogura Station) is less than a minute's walk away, convenient transportation.Convenience stores and supermarkets are nearby.So, even if you stay for a long time, you can spend a comfortable time here.The spaceâ—‰ Free Wi-Fi (fixed)Double bed: 1Single bed: 1Air Conditioningâ—‰1F Washing machineâ—‰2/3F Kitchen (fridge/microwave/induction cooker).â—‰ Trash canBlackout curtainsBathroom with bidetHair DryerBathroom with showerFace Towel/Bath Towel/ToothbrushPlease note that only one set of towels is provided per person per stay. If you need extra towels, please bring your own.â—‰ Shower gel, shampoo and hair conditionerRecommended public transportation routes:1.	From Narita Airport, take the Keisei Line (KS) Ueno direction to Ueno Station (purchase the limited express train Skyliner or express train Access ticket to get there quickly) â†’ Takasaki Line (JU) Takasaki direction to Okuzu Station â†’ walk for about 2 minutes to get there.2.	From Haneda Airport, take the Airport Line (KK) in the direction of Imbanihon-Idai/Aonogi/Keisei Takasago/Narita Airport/Inzai Muka to Shinagawa Station â†’ Tokaido Line (HT) in the direction of Takasaki to Ogiku Station â†’ Walk for about 2 minutes to reach the destination.3.	From Tokyo Station/Shinagawa Station/other Shinkansen stations, take the Tokaido Line (HT) towards Takasaki to Oku Station â†’ It takes about 2 minutes on foot.Guest accessâ—‰ This is your private space, and you can freely use all the areas in the room during your stay.Other things to noteâ—‰ Regarding pets: No pets are allowed in this accommodation.â—‰ Smoking is prohibited in all areas of the accommodation, including common areas, hallways, stairwells, rooms, balconies, etc. According to the Japanese Health Promotion Law and local regulations, smoking in prohibited areas is illegal. If you smoke, please be sure to move to a designated legal smoking area such as a nearby convenience store or station.â—‰ According to the Fire Service Act, the Residential Accommodation Business Act, and local regulations in Japan, a maximum of 2 people can stay in this room. It is illegal to change the main occupant or exceed the number of occupants. Please be sure to check in with the same number of occupants and the same ID documents provided at the time of booking.Registration DetailsHotels and Inns Business Act | æ±äº¬éƒ½åŒ—åŒºä¿å¥æ‰€ | 7åŒ—å¥ç”Ÿç’°ãç¬¬59å·

title: The Blue Room
location: Room in Redfern, Australia
description: Step back into the charm of the Victorian era with this double bedroom and itâ€™s  balcony. Relax at this peaceful and centrally located home which is moments from all central Sydney can offer.The spaceMy home has two spaces that I let out for guests. Space 1 is The Blue room for one guest is at the front of the house on the second floor with a balcony overlooking the street Space 2 is an Attic bedroom with separate study for 2 guests. The rooms are located on both the second and third floor.There is one bathroom shared between the guests, this is on the ground floor via the kitchen.Guest accessGuests may access all shared areas of my home, bathroom, kitchen, lounge, dinning room, laundry and garden.During your stayI prefer to interact via the Airbnb app. Or in person when I am home.Registration DetailsPID-STRA-53802

title: Surry Hills Prime Location: Room #3
location: Room in Surry Hills, Australia
description: ì•ˆë…•, æ¬¢è¿, Hola a todos, Bienvenue, WelcomeCatering for international guestsNo parties3 cats ğŸˆMy homeI live in 1 room and Airbnb 4 private rooms with locks. Common areas are shared with other guests (kitchen, bathroom, lounge room).700m Central Station500m Museum StationI can help with bag storage before check-in and after check-out (9am to 9pm). Please just ask politely ğŸ˜ŠThe spaceThis room has a single size bed (see photos for size dimensions)The house is older, but is kept clean and tidy, and is in a perfect location across from a park and public transport. You can walk to Town Hall in about 15 minutes, and Chinatown in 5 minutes. There are famous cafes 50m from the house, and the area has really nice bars and restaurants.I don't charge extra for cleaning but expect guests not to make a mess and clean up after themselves especially in the kitchen and bathroom so that it is fair for other guests.The house caters to international guests. I want guests to have the correct expectations of the house, so please look at photos and the reviews first and ask me any questions. I find the guests that have the most positive experience at my house are international guests who:- have travel experience- have done comparative research of airbnb's, hotels, and hostels in Sydney, and- believe I am offering a good and fair valuePlease do not book if you are uncomfortable with sharing spaces (e.g., bathroom), or if you have unrealistic expectations (e.g., compare my house against accomodation 2-3x the price).I do not do early check-ins or late check-outs. Please do not ask. But I can help with bag storage before check-in (strictly after 9am) and after check-out (until 9pm). Please just ask politely as this is more of a favour than a service.Guest accessYou can use all the kitchen, the fridge, laundry, bathroom, and lounge room. Please just don't enter rooms that have numbers other than your own room number ğŸ˜Š (they have locks anywayDuring your stayI give guests their privacy and interact more on their terms. I generally ask in passing how everything is going and if guests need anythingIf there are any questions, concerns. or something is not up to standard then please reach out immediately :)Registration DetailsPID-STRA-59306

title: New Cosy Apartment w/own bathroom (Female Only)
location: Room in Wolli Creek, Australia
description: Beautiful, quiet & comfortable brand new apartment near train station 15 mins to CBD. You will have your own private room with a very comfortable bed, private bathroom and share the living room and kitchen. This apartment is spacious w/2 balconies & plenty of privacy. Located in a convenient area within walking distance to 2 supermarkets (Woolworth & Aldi), a variety of restaurants, cafes and an Asian grocery market.  Opposite to a nice park by the water. Great location!The spaceModern, clean and comfortable.Guest accessAll common areas and roof top garden.During your stayText message, email.Other things to noteI am supportive of a safe and clean environment and also practise all Covid safety procedures at home.Registration DetailsPID-STRA-36825

title: Garden Villa
location: Room in Botany, Australia
description: This clean, bright and private room in a Garden Villa complex is conveniently located only 10 minutes from Sydney Airport by Uber (20 minutes by public transport) and 30 minutes to Sydney city by public transport. There is free car parking in the allocated Visitor car spaces  in the complex. If Visitor car spaces are full,  free street parking available. Included is a complimentary continental breakfast, tea and coffee.The spaceThe villa has a charming courtyard space. Herbs grow in the Courtyard and are available for guests to sprinkle on salads or use for cooking. Smoking is allowed in the Courtyard area but not in the house.Guest accessGuests can enjoy a tranquil single bedroom close to the bathroom which includes a separate bath for a long hot soak after a big day. All areas of the villa are shared except for the private bedrooms. Please feel free to use the kitchen.During your stayI am around the house at random times and happy to interact with guests while respecting individual needs for privacy. As a Sydneysider, I am happy to share my knowledge of Sydney and the local area.Other things to noteIt is important to  note that being close to the Airport means that there is some aircraft noise but only at a distance. There is a curfew on all air traffic between midnight and 6am.Registration DetailsPID-STRA-16566

title: Private studio inside our home
location: Entire guesthouse in Newtown, Australia
description: This private studio is inside our family home. The studio is 25m2 and has its own private entrance. Step out of your room into the main hallway of our house to enter your private bathroom. A partition separates your bathroom from the rest of our home for complete privacy.You have a kitchenette (no kitchen sink) and Queen bed in opposite corners of the room, leaving the rest of the room as a living area with 2 sofas and a TV.Wifi is superfast at 250mbpsRegistration DetailsPID-STRA-8393
